message:
Budget 2017-18 is a #BudgetForBetterIndia. It lays out a roadmap for India's development & positively impacts every section of society. The Budget reforms old processes, empowers our human capital & aims to rejuvenate the economy.

Robust agriculture growth & doubling of farmer income gets an impetus in the Budget. When the farmer prospers, India progresses. Poverty alleviation initiatives will get renewed vigour. Effective & extensive implementation will ensure tangible gains for beneficiaries.
